createClass module

Create Class

This class contains the sekleton of the create window. This also functions as edit window.

class createClass.createWindow(root, filename)[source]

Bases: object

Inputs:
root

the root object

type of root

this is the root widget

filename

name of the file when working as edit file and empty when called to create new file

type of filename

string

getFileData(filename)[source]

This method write the contents of the sepecfied file

Inputs :
filename

name of the file to be opened

type of filename

string

saveTheFile()[source]

This gets called when we save the file.

textAreaModified(e)[source]

Whenever the text gets updated this method updates the code on the preview screen. Inputs:

event

Object of the event

type of event

Object of type event
